actionConfiguration.body:
select distinct td.chapter_tag,cdm.chapter_name from  public.test_details as td left join public.chapter_details_master as cdm on td.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag 
join public.course_test_track as ctt on ctt.test_id = td.test_id
 join  public.section_master as sm on sm.section_id = ctt.section_id
 join public.school_class_info as sci on sm.class_id = sci.class_id

where subject_id={{subjec.selectedOptionValue}} and sm.class_id= {{st.selectedOptionValue}} and deadline = '{{test_da.selectedDate}}' and school_id = {{schoo.selectedOptionValue}}
